title: Soffront and Cobb Chamber Partner to Bring Integrated Sales and Email Marketing Automation to Small and Medium Businesses
text:
Cobb Chamber offers Soffront’s acclaimed sales and marketing automation software to their members to help them understand which leads are ready to buy.
Fremont, Calif. (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Soffront Software Inc ., the pioneer CRM software, today announced that the Cobb Chamber has partnered with Soffront to provide small and medium businesses with the most effective and easy to use sales and marketing automation software on the market.
Soffront combines CRM with automated email and social marketing . It has helped thousands of small businesses effortlessly identify the leads that are ready to buy.
Soffront founder and CEO, Manu Das, said, “This partnership is a win-win for the Cobb Chamber and Soffront. The Cobb Chamber offers Soffront’s award-winning CRM and marketing automation solution to their members and Soffront gains a prestigious partner to help more small and medium businesses succeed.”
According to David Connel, President and CEO of the Cobb Chamber of Commerce, “As a business advocacy organization, offering world-class member services is an important part of our mission. We’re excited to partner with SOFFRONT, allowing our members the opportunity to utilize CRM services to increase efficiency and sales. SOFFRONT is a perfect fit for our members to help small business entrepreneurs and large corporations.”
About Cobb Chamber of Commerce
As one of the most influential business advocacy organizations in Georgia and one of the top three chambers in the nation, the Cobb Chamber is the only organization in Cobb County dedicated to bringing the community and its leaders together to create jobs and strengthen the economy and quality of life so businesses and the community can achieve more. The Chamber achieves this by creating jobs and driving economic development; strengthening the community and the region; growing member businesses and nurturing leadership; and connecting businesses, government and the community.
About Soffront Software, Inc.
For over twenty-two years, Soffront has provided Sales and Marketing automation solutions to small-to medium sized companies. Compared to other sales and marketing automation providers, Soffront helps small business owners effortlessly identify their best leads, so they stop losing time calling on those who are not ready to buy. Companies that switch to Soffront report great improvements in efficiency by having everything (email marketing, social media and CRM) in one place so they can see how their leads are interacting with their marketing activities. Soffront's integrated CRM contains all of the required functionality including sales force automation, marketing automation, customer service, and project management. Soffront CRM provides a higher return on investment, generating more revenue, more savings and a better user experience. Soffront is privately held, debt-free and profitable.
